20110129024638.000|20110129024640.000|CC1|SINGLE CUSTOMER IN CALIFORNIA

20110129024651.000|20110129024653.000|CC1|TACO BELL MEAT, IT FOUND THAT IT
20110129024653.000|20110129024656.000|CC1|CONTAINED LESS THAN 35% REAL

20110129024657.000|20110129024658.000|CC1|PRODUCT TO BE LABELED AS BEEF,  
20110129024658.000|20110129024700.000|CC1|IT HAS TO CONTAIN AT LEAST 40%.
